name: I am Breaking Down Your Walls Redux
name_original: I am Breaking Down Your Walls Redux
description:
WOAH! A REMAKE? FROM THE SEA FERRET?

Yessir, I remade my first ever mini jam game, because I was bored one night :). Gonna update it occasionally, but 100% not my main project. Enjoy it.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Click - Punch

Right click - Zoom

Shift - Sprint

Esc - Free mouse
